Question: Immodesty Blaize said she had been entranced by this person crash, finding it "by turns horrifying, bemusing and funny".
Hints: This person wore a dress valued at £9000 with a 25-foot (8-metre) train.
In January 1997, pictures of this person touring an Angolan minefield in a ballistic helmet and flak jacket were seen worldwide.
In 1998, Azermarka issued postage stamps with both Azeri and English captions, commemorating this person.
